title: Jay and Silent Bob's New Game - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.12.19
description:
Get started with the Hims complete hair kit for just $5 today right now at http://forhims.com/GAMESDAILY.

Interabang Entertainment's Justin Woodward joins Greg to talk about the new game Jay and Silent Bob Mall Brawl, indie development, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:10 - Special Guest: Justin Woodward (@InterabangEnt)
00:12:28 - “I was wondering if Jay and Silent Bob Chronic Blunt Punch will make its way to the Nintendo Switch” - Magnus Apeland
00:15:08 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Colton Yoder, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
Today, we’re brought to you by Hims, but I’ll tell you about that later.
The Roper Report   -
00:15:33 - Facebook Exec: You ain’t seen nothing yet in VR
00:23:16 - Fortnite Streaming Numbers Drop
00:33:46 - Ubi Bans XP Farming ACO Missions
00:40:16 - Goodbye Splatoon Events
00:43:00 - Out today
00:46:35 -  Hims
Reader mail   -
00:47:56 - “What are some of the games in your backlog that you're planning on playing?” - Fendyy
00:50:46 - “Do you think Google’s AI will become a new feature of the Stadia?” - The Nano Biologist
00:55:39 - “There has been talk about how a games DLC comes out too far after the game has come out…” - Borzen00
01:00:06 - Squad Up: Farmer Josh - Ps4 - TheFarmerJosh
01:00:42 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Greg and Trisha Hersberger
TUESDAY: Greg and Jacob Dekker (GameSpot)
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Andrea and Fran
FRIDAY: Fran and Andrea

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
